name: DenseMetal
description:
A Fun, Retro-style, 2d pixel art game inspired by the theme less is more.

You play as an enhanced supersoldier tasked with defending your ship from dense, metallic robots that are on a mission to take you down.

Your Job is to fight through 5 waves of enemies and make it through this perilous encounter.

The more Robots Land on the ship, the lower the altitude gets. Remember, less is more. The less bots on the ship, the higher the altitude meter.

Our Submission for the BTP one week Game Jam. All art, music, sfx, code and assets belong to and were made from scratch by NakelGames A  and O.
